revised_title: A New Method for Plant Reproduction and the History of Beverages
tldr: The author describes a method to make flowers and fruits grow without seeds, using orange flowers, oil of sweet almonds, and rock alum. They successfully grew orange flowers in oil and observed them transforming into fruit. Additionally, the author discusses the history of various beverages and their uses throughout different nations and cultures.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
